Html:
thanks! Very good plugin, easy to use.

is it possible to add hints to stars in next version?

 

Best rgds

spongesbobplitpants

Thank you. I was on holidays, so didn't see your message until now. 

With hints you mean tool tips? Should they be numerical (like the numerical value) or should they be some custom text?

I could also expose another event "hover", during which one could get the current "hover" value, and show your own tooltip. This is probably the most flexible solution.

﻿
Thank you for your reply.
It is great to add new feature to your script, although I modified your script to show hints(custom text and number), I still look forward to your new version, wish it a powerful plugin.
Best rgds

主题： Re: how to add hints to stars? [rateit:237756]

From: gidon

Thank you. I was on holidays, so didn't see your message until now.

With hints you mean tool tips? Should they be numerical (like the numerical value) or should they be some custom text?

I could also expose another event "hover", during which one could get the current "hover" value, and show your own tooltip. This is probably the most flexible solution.

I've uploaded a new version, which includes the hover event, which enables the option to add tooltips.

Look at example #10 to see a sample implementation.

﻿
Many thanks,Dude.
